type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Leading Ladies[/i] – When Sharena enters, you become the monarch. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast this turn.
[i]United Fensalir – [/i]{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each card you have drawn this turn.
